Method Detail

convertFlatResponseToMap

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> convertFlatResponseToMap(java.lang.String response)
This method parses the Live Journal flat response on newline characters as per the flat protocol and stores the keys and values in a map.

Parameters:
response - The flat response from Live Journal
Returns:
Map of response keys value pairs
